Texts.Eng: Brain, you are an idiot. You are about to die, and all you need to do to stop that problem is ^red;murder and devour^reset; the next person you see. Get on it. Or I'll make you.

Texts.Chs: 你好，由于你受到爆炸性减压或者极端压强的作用，你似乎正在接近死亡的边缘。你应该快速地寻找一处安全区域或者无抵抗的面对死亡！
Texts.Eng: Greetings! You appear to be rapidly dying due to explosive decompression or extreme pressure. You should seek safetly, and relatively quickly or face imminent death!
I am slowly going crazy. 1 2 3 4 5 6 switch.
I can't help but notice: You're still hungry, and your ^red;hellish maw is not dripping with the viscera of the slain^reset;. What is wrong with you? Eat ^red;sentient species^reset;!
I want to eat raw flesh.
Okay. You're really getting hungry now. Why haven't you ^red;eaten a close personal friend^reset; yet? They are full of nutrients!
The voices in the wind have informed you of a fantastic sale! It can only be found at the bottom of a Sulphuric Ocean, and only if you're naked! Totally legit! Check it out!

Texts.Chs:
警告！这颗星球上的辐射极其危险！
如果没有适当的防护措施，我不建议你继续探索！
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! RADIATION LEVELS ON THIS PLANET ARE EXTREMELY HAZARDOUS!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
警告！这颗星球上温度极高！
如果没有适当的防护措施，我不建议你继续探索！
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! TEMPERATURE ON THIS PLANET IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
警告！这颗星球上温度极低！
如果没有适当的防护措施，我不建议你继续探索！
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! TEMPERATURE ON THIS PLANET IS DANGEROUSLY LOW!
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
Why do I increasingly feel like I require meat?
You're getting pretty hangry. That means angry and hungry. Because hunger. Food. Have you considered ^red;cannibalism^reset;? It's fast and easy! Try it ! Murder a neighbor! Trust the voices.
^red;ALERT: MENTAL STATE DETERIORATING^reset;: Something is causing your thoughts and feelings to become jumbled. Focus is difficult and you feel yourself going insane...
